actionable_tasks.title: Add MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Implement compound indexes on MongoDB collections used for analytics to improve query performance. This is a research-derived task from the Perplexity sweep and does not require external dependencies.
implementation_steps: Identify the most frequent and slow analytics queries in the codebase.
Design compound indexes in MongoDB to cover these query patterns.
Add index creation logic to the application startup or migration scripts.
Test query performance before and after index creation.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes to MongoDB collections storing telemetry data to automatically expire old records, reducing storage overhead and improving query performance.
implementation_steps: Identify collections storing telemetry/analytics data.
Add TTL index creation logic (e.g., db.collection.createIndex({ createdAt: 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 2592000 })).
Test data expiration behavior.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Response Streaming for Large Analytics Datasets
actionable_tasks.description: Modify analytics endpoints to stream large result sets instead of loading everything into memory at once, improving scalability and reducing memory usage.
implementation_steps: Identify endpoints returning large datasets.
Refactor these endpoints to use MongoDB cursor streaming or Node.js stream APIs.
Update frontend to handle streamed responses if necessary.
Test with large datasets to verify memory and performance improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Prometheus Metrics Export for Alerting
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate Prometheus client library to expose backend metrics (e.g., request counts, error rates, latency) for monitoring and alerting.
implementation_steps: Add Prometheus client library to the project.
Instrument key endpoints and services to collect metrics.
Expose a `/metrics` endpoint for Prometheus scraping.
Test metric collection and visualization in a monitoring dashboard.

actionable_tasks.title: Complete Frontend Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the UI for Spotify OAuth authentication, ensuring a smooth user onboarding experience.
implementation_steps: Review existing OAuth flow and identify missing UI elements.
Implement remaining UI components (e.g., login button, error states, loading indicators).
Test the authentication flow end-to-end.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Memory Profiling with clinic.js
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate clinic.js for memory profiling during development and testing to identify and fix memory leaks.
implementation_steps: Add clinic.js as a dev dependency.
Create npm scripts to run memory profiling (e.g., 'profile:memory').
Document usage in the developer guide.

actionable_tasks.title: Add sonar-project.properties and npm Scripts for SonarQube
actionable_tasks.description: Configure SonarQube static analysis by adding a sonar-project.properties file and npm scripts for lint/test/typecheck/scan:sonar.
implementation_steps: Create sonar-project.properties with project metadata.
Add npm scripts for SonarQube analysis (e.g., 'scan:sonar').
Test the SonarQube scan locally.
